Plot: A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.
Title: Couples Retreat
Writer: Jon Favreau, Vince Vaughn, Dana Fox
Actors: Vince Vaughn, Jason Bateman, Faizon Love, Jon Favreau
tomatoConsensus: Despite a talented cast and some reliably pleasant interplay between Jon Favreau and Vince Vaughn, Couples Retreat leaves viewers stranded in an arid, mirthless comedy.
